## Description {#details}

This file implements a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> analysis pass specific to the <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hexagon">Hexagon</a> target machine.

It uses the target&#39;s detailed information to provide more precise answers to certain <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a> queries, while letting the target independent and default <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a> implementations handle the rest.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Src-&gt;isVectorTy()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vectortype">VectorType</a> &#42;VecTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;VectorType&gt;</a>(Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecWidth = VecTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a833daf718a49c5cd637d8c9ddeaebe07">getPrimitiveSizeInBits</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/details/fixedorscalablequantity/#a33880aaca0ad05e5f1557f079305bde5">getFixedValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (isHVXVectorType(VecTy)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegWidth =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonttiimpl/#a93c79803cd09a8a423ffcacb4dee8d44">getRegisterBitWidth</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo/#a8bb3b1ccf19b8c85429b777dfa4a0166a183020fbea95c99db23f6d3594f4c4af">TargetTransformInfo::RGK&#95;FixedWidthVector</a>)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RegWidth &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Non-zero vector register width expected&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cost of HVX loads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (VecWidth % RegWidth == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> VecWidth / RegWidth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Cost of constructing HVX vector from scalar loads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> RegAlign(RegWidth / 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Alignment || &#42;Alignment &gt; RegAlign)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Alignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AlignWidth = 8 &#42; Alignment-&gt;value();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLoads = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab102f0f12dd38aeea5906b1d80c792ff">alignTo</a>(VecWidth, AlignWidth) / AlignWidth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 3 &#42; NumLoads;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Alignment == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(4) || Alignment == <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(8))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Allow non-throughput costs that aren&#39;t binary.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonttiimpl/#a7a66ba3c828edf70998d427ba626559e"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instructioncost">InstructionCost</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonttiimpl/#a7a66ba3c828edf70998d427ba626559e">HexagonTTIImpl::getVectorInstrCost</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Val,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Need two rotations for non-zero index.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If it&#39;s not a 32-bit value, there will need to be an extract.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a19921a3ceb99548f498d3df118eda9ed">Cost</a> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hexagonttiimpl/#a7a66ba3c828edf70998d427ba626559e">getVectorInstrCost</a>(Instruction::ExtractElement, Val, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/costmodel-cpp/#a162d8b2b3865594d1e14d828d2b8336a">CostKind</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode == Instruction::ExtractElement)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1;</span></CodeLine>
